# the pipe

```{r eval=FALSE}
foo_foo <- little_bunny()

## orthodox R style
bop_on(scoop_up(hop_through(foo_foo, forest), field_mouse), head)
```
--
```{r eval=FALSE}
## novel pipe syntax
foo_foo %>%
  hop_through(forest) %>%
  scoop_up(field_mouse) %>%
  bop_on(head)
```
